title: Ed Miliband – 2014 Speech on Condition of Britain Report
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Ed Miliband, the Leader of the Opposition, at the launch of the IPPR Condition of Britain Report. The speech was made on 19th June 2014.
